Package com.worldpay.library.webservices.services.paymentmethods

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreatePaymentMethodRequest
    This object is used both to create a new payment method and to update an existing payment method for a customer
    DeletePaymentMethodRequest
    Deletes the approved Payment Method from a Customer record on the gateway.
    GetPaymentMethodRequest
    Searches for a specific Payment Method associated to the given Customer ID.
    PaymentMethodResponse
    Response to the request for payment information.
    UpdatePaymentMethodRequest
    Updates a the specified Payment Method on the specified Customer's record if it is present on the gateway.
